msbt.message: Back for that sparkler I tried to give you before?
If you're anything like me, you'll have a lot of fun with that thing. Give it a try later, .
Wait, aren't your pockets still full of stuff? Guess I'll just be keeping this for the time being I don't mind.

Right now, I am holding onto what might be the coolest thing on this island and maybe the whole planet. It's a sparkler! I bet you thought I was overselling it A huh huh!Wanna know the best part? I got this one special for you!
Hold on. Gotta wipe off the crumbs.
Hey! It's just the person I wanted to see. You're gonna want me to be standing up for this. It's that big
